title: 帮助解惑。ESS,BOSSSHOP,OTHERDROPS,RES鄙人定尽力!
author: losew

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
@redmhorse   领地最大范围在Residence文件夹中的config文本设置：这一块
Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3（最大拥有领地数量）
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2（最大包含生态环境数量）不确定
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 100（东北宽）
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 100（南北长）
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256（上下径）
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 0（最低）
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MaxHeight: 255（最高）
            # The maximum recursive depth that subzones can go.
            # A subzone within a subzone within the Residence zone would be a depth of 2.
            # Set to 0 to disable subzones.
           SubzoneDepth: 3
           # Whether or not to allow teleporting to Residences.
           CanTeleport: true
           # Allow or Disallow the use of /res unstuck, to get yourself out of a residence if stuck in one somehow
           Unstuck: true
           # Allow or Disallow the use of the /res select command, if disabled they can only use the selection tool.
           SelectCommandAccess: true
           # Allow or Disallow the group to access the Blacklist/Ignorelist for residences they own.
           ItemListAccess: true
       # Options relating to enter and leave messages on the residence.

replies.author: Designer
replies.txt_content:
losew 发表于 2014-8-14 09:57
地皮世界？
对  PlotMe插件

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
Designer 发表于 2014-8-14 09:59
对  PlotMe插件
首先/plotme biomelist  会出现一些生态的英文名字。
然后把这些生态名字自己找意思，找到草原或者草地。类似的就行（我没试过）
/plotme biome <biome>   把英文生态名代入<biome> ，输入这条指令。

replies.author: Designer
replies.txt_content:
losew 发表于 2014-8-14 10:20
首先/plotme biomelist  会出现一些生态的英文名字。
然后把这些生态名字自己找意思，找到草原或者草地。 ...
好吧 谢了

replies.author: w1964853405
replies.txt_content: 怎么改，领地一个方块的钱

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 losew 于 2014-8-14 17:05 编辑 
w1964853405 发表于 2014-8-14 16:44
怎么改，领地一个方块的钱

这一段：Economy:
          # Whether or not players in this group can buy other Residences that are for sale.
          CanBuy: true（玩家是否能买领地）
          # Whether or not players in this group can sell their Residences.
          CanSell: false（玩家是否能卖领地）

          # Whether or not to ignore the Residence size/count limits when buying a residence.
          IgnoreLimits: false（创建领地时无视限制）
          # The cost, per block, of making a new Residence or adding a area to it.
          BuyCost: 0.05（价格./每个方块）=！！！这个。
          # The cost, per block, of renewing a Residence lease (if the lease system is enabled).
          RenewCost: 0.02（租借的领地方块价格  /个方块）

久等了。在Residence文件夹中的config里找，改完记得保存。

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
贱男春 发表于 2014-8-20 13:24
bossshop读取不到points插件怎么解决Points（点，这个需要以下插件配合PlayerPoints/CommandPoints/Enjin Points和所有其他支持BossAPI的点插件）
建议使用PlayerPoints，原因吗？用起来比较简单，并且是BossShop的作者制作的，跟普通的经济插件没两样，其实最重要的是……我汉化了。
PS：其实在大天朝里我觉得这个“点”应该翻译成为点卷23333
汉化版PlayerPoints：点我下载~~至于这个点卷插件的指令跟权限请到原帖查看，这里不做详细介绍。
详见一楼BOSSSHOP原帖。

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
kkr19999 发表于 2014-8-21 20:59
请问，我的BossShop都弄好了 可是在游戏里输入/bs他却提示，那家商店不存在？/bs 主菜单也是 .../bs - 打开主店/bs <shop> - 打开指定的商店
LS用的是BSC编辑器吧，注意编辑器里点一个商店以后，上面有编辑商店一栏，点击进去，那个商店名就是这个商店的名字，/bs （商店名）         商店名建议改成简单的字母，比如传送=cs，buy商店=buy        这样。不懂欢迎提问=w=

replies.txt_content:
嗯是这样的,我按照之前的方法修改了
   Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 500
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 300
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 999999999
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 9999999999
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 9999999999
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 9999999999
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MaxHeight: 9999999999
            # The maximum recursive depth that subzones can go.
            # A subzone within a subzone within the Residence zone would be a depth of 2.
            # Set to 0 to disable subzones.
           SubzoneDepth: 3
           # Whether or not to allow teleporting to Residences.

           # Allow or Disallow the use of /res unstuck, to get yourself out of a residence if stuck in one somehow
